ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Will the reward for doing good be anything other than good?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Should the reward of goodness be aught else but goodness? --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Can the reward of goodness be any other than goodness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Can any thing else be a response to a favor but a favor?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What is the reward of virtue except virtue (in return)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Is there any reward for good other than good
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Is the reward of goodness aught but goodness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Shall the recompense of goodness be other than goodness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Is the reward of goodness aught save goodness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The reward of goodness shall be nothing but goodness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Shall the recompense of kindness be aught save kindness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Is the requital of goodness anything but goodness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Is there any Reward for Good - other than Good?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Is there any reward for good other than good?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Shall the recompense of goodness be anything other than goodness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Is the reward of goodness anything but goodness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:60] Is the reward of goodness, [manifested] through obedience, anything but goodness?, [granted] through bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Is the reward of goodness aught save goodness?) He says: is the reward of he whom We have blessed with the profession of Allah's divine Oneness anything but the Garden?
